DOC.brief_summary: This study tests the hypothesis that the bioavailability of alprazolam from a new sublingual formulation is the same as that from an existing sublingual formulation.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence of a New and a Commercial Alprazolam Sublingual Formulation
DOC.criteria: healthy male or female subjects BMI 18 to 26.9 must give informed consent clinically significant disease narrow angle glaucoma positive drug screen
